game.name: Trivia Vault Olympics Trivia
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Olympics Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Olympics trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Olympics Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Olympics trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

reviewHighlights.text: Trivia Vault Olympics Trivia is built around a straightforward but appealing concept: you step into the role of a game show contestant, racing against...
